cloudpolling

Class PollingProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • cloudpolling.PollingProject

  • public class PollingProject
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a polling project that contains many cloud accounts.
    Author:
    tlarrue

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PollingProject(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String configDir)
      Constructs a PollingProject from a unique name and directory where all configuration files for cloudpolling projects are stored.

        configDir - directory where project configuration files are stored

    • Method Detail

      • setConfiguration

        public void setConfiguration()
        Creates a configuration file using polling project template if it does not already exist. If it does exist, validates the fields and report if further action is needed to configure the account.
